params._slateStakeAmount: The number of tokens required to stake on a slate
params._startTime: The start time of the first batch

recommendSlate(uint256,uint256,uint256[].details: Create a new slate with the associated requestIds and metadata hash.

params.category: The category to submit the slate for

params.requestIDs: A list of request IDs to include in the slate
